Enum Constant Detail

DEFAULT

public static final CsvFormat.TYPE_FORMAT DEFAULT
Default formatter. If value is null, it will be replace by an empty string.

Since:
0.0.1

NO_CARRIAGE_RETURN

public static final CsvFormat.TYPE_FORMAT NO_CARRIAGE_RETURN
Delete all carriage return in field value and replace them by a pattern (By default a space).

Since:
0.0.4

DATE

public static final CsvFormat.TYPE_FORMAT DATE

Format a date. The pattern is based on SimpleDateFormat pattern.

The type of field can be java.util.Date, Timestamp or Calendar.

The default locale is Locale.FRANCE and the default pattern is MM/dd/yyyy

Since:
0.0.1
See Also:
SimpleDateFormat

NUMBER

public static final CsvFormat.TYPE_FORMAT NUMBER

Format a number. The pattern is based on DecimalFormat pattern. The pattern is required.

The type of field can be Integer, Long, Float or Double.

Since:
0.0.1
See Also:
DecimalFormat

CURRENCY

public static final CsvFormat.TYPE_FORMAT CURRENCY

Format a price. The pattern indicates the number of digits for integer part and fraction part.

Example.
  • pattern (0.00) : 12.356 ==> 2.36
  • pattern (.00) : 12.356 ==> 12.36
  • pattern (.##) : 12.356 ==> 12.36
  • pattern (##.) : 12.356 ==> 12.356
  • pattern (###.##) : 12.356 ==> 12.36
  • pattern (000.##) : 12.356 ==> 012.36
  • no pattern : 12.356 ==> 12.36

The locale must to set the country variable. The pattern is not required.

The type of field can be Integer, Long, Float or Double.

The default local is Locale.FRANCE. No pattern defines.

Since:
0.0.1
See Also:
NumberFormat

NONE

public static final CsvFormat.TYPE_FORMAT NONE
No format

Since:
0.0.1

BOOLEAN

public static final CsvFormat.TYPE_FORMAT BOOLEAN
Format boolean value.

List of pattern:
  • boolean: true or false
  • Boolean: True or False
  • BOOLEAN: TRUE or FALSE
  • B: T or F
  • b: t or f
  • integer: 1 or 0
  • y/n: y or n
  • Y/N: Y or N
  • o/n: o or n
  • O/N: O or N
  • on/off: on or off
  • On/Off: On or Off
  • ON/OFF
  • litteral: yes or no in function locale
  • Litteral: Yes or No in function locale
  • LITTERAL: YES or NO in function locale

The default local is Locale.FRANCE and the default pattern is "boolean"

Since:
0.0.1

CUSTOM

public static final CsvFormat.TYPE_FORMAT CUSTOM
Custom format. The class must implement CsvFormatter

Since:
0.0.1
